name: Document #087-1
description:
Document #087-1 is an adaptation of "Document #087-I" by Zaeyde, from the SCP Wiki.

Document #087-1 is a short atmospheric horror game where you play as D-8432, a D-Class at the SCP foundation, sent to explore their new discovery on a university campus after a recent mishandlling of SCP-███.

What lies beneath?
